lyrics.text:
Sīsū ‘oku mau tokanga
Ki he ‘Afiona,
Ko homau Huhu’i koe
‘I he’emau hia.

Ko e ‘Eiki anga’ofa
Ki he laumālie,
‘O e kakai angahia
Mo e li’ekina.

Pea ‘oku mau kōlenga
Ki he ‘Afiona
Ke ke fakahā ho’o ‘ofa
Ki he kau masiva.

Pea ke nau siofia
‘A e ‘Afiona,
‘I he teunga pani toto
‘I he’emau hia.

Ka ke foa ‘a e maka
‘O e loto kovi,
Pea nau ongo’i leva
Ho’o ngāue lelei.

Ke ke fakahā ho nima,
Pea mo ho va’e,
Pea mo ho vakavaka
Na’a nau hoka’i.
